attributes.action: Make British overseas territories fully part of the UK
attributes.additional_details: We are stronger as a nation if we make them part of the UK. We will also have more influence around the world if we make this a reality. It's what the British Overseas Territories deserve as they should have the right to be a British citizen just like all those born in the UK. France made all their overseas territories part of the republic of France so why don't we do the same of all of the British Overseas Territories.
attributes.background: i want to make all British overseas territories fully part of the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We understand you're concerned about the status of British Overseas Territories, but we're not sure what you mean by making them 'fully part' of the UK.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to offer full UK citizenship to citizens of British Overseas Territories, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
